"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f008e06368723731000100#post_53f008e06368723731000100
What did he do this time?![/bq]
Short version is that he was indicted on corruption charges and blabbed his mouth without thinking it through saying that it was legal.  Perry pretty much fully admitted to breaking the law because he is too dumb to realize that going "but it wasn't illegal" can count as a confession.

Basically imagine a dumb criminal that robs a store and when he gets arrested he goes, "But it wasn't illegal to rob the store".
